ComicInfo.Title: Nightmare Island; The Gypsy Curse; The Last Dance; Conspiracy with Death; The Living-Dead of Kulatum!; Horror's Scrapbook; The Spectral Sergeant; Serpent of Doom
ComicInfo.Summary:
Nightmare Island: An island off the Australian coast proves indeed to be haunted, as a dockworker finds out who volunteered to spend the night there.
The Gypsy Curse: Nogoodnik Lou disposes of his difigured wife and is therefore faced with a gypsy curse. He won't find happiness as fate strikes pushing him into poverty and madness.
The Last Dance: A cavalry soldier killed by Apaches returns from the dead to prevent his girl from marrying someone else.
Conspiracy with Death: A sailor pays a witch doctor to put a jinx on his rival. The sailer gets the girl, but refuses to pay his debt. It's his turn to be jinxed now.
The Living-Dead of Kulatum!: In Brazil an explorer discovers the pyramids of Manoa and the cult of the living-dead. His escape is only temporary, for he is lost in the jungle.
Horror's Scrapbook: Accounts of weird occurrences and incidents.
The Spectral Sergeant: A sergeant's phantom warns his soldier buddies about an imminent German attack in WW I.
Serpent of Doom: Lydia longs for riches and enters into a pact with snake god Seth. Covering her murderous tracks, Seth grants her fame and fortune. When Lydia herself begins to turn into a snake, she plunges into despair.
